bibl.title: Women in Hellenistic Egypt from Alexander to Cleopatra.
bibl.note: Introduction: The Status of Greek Women in Egypt. - 1. Queens. - 2. Alexandrian Women. - 3. Some Married Women in the Papyri. - 4. Slaves and Workers. - 5. Women's Role in the Economy. - Notes. Works Cited. Index of Greek Papyri and Ostraca. General Index.
Pomeroy Sarah B., Women in Hellenistic Egypt from Alexander to Cleopatra.
New York, Schocken, 1984, 8Â°, xxv-241 pp., 2 cartes, 13 illustr.
